- |void| **set_colors**\ (\ value\: :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>`\ )
- :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>` **get_colors**\ (\ )

æ¸å˜çš„é¢œè‰²ï¼Œç±»å‹ä¸º :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>`\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ è®¾ç½®è¯¥å±æ€§ä¼šä¸€æ¬¡æ€§æ›´æ–°æ‰€æœ‰é¢œè‰²ã€‚å•ç‹¬æ›´æ”¹æŸä¸ªé¢œè‰²è¯·ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`set_color<class_Gradient_method_set_color>`\ ã€‚

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>` for more details.
